definitions.definition: To bring (a system, etc.) online; to promote to an active or running state.
Of a system: connected (generally electrically) to a larger network.
Available over, or delivered from, the Internet.
definitions.example: I prefer to read online newspapers.
I'll be online tonight, so I'll be able to reply to your email.

definitions.definition: Available on a computer system, even if not networked.
definitions.example: Press the F1 key to access the online help.

definitions.definition: Of a system: active, particularly building facilities (such as power) or a factory or power plant.
definitions.example: Once this factory comes online, it will double car production in our country!

definitions.definition: While online; while in a running or active state, or connected to the Internet.
